items.name: Object_StackLayout
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Object_StackLayout
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Object_StackLayout extends ui.Object_UIElement
    @accessors "zIndex", 
        set: (v) -> @zIndex_ = v, 
        get: -> (@zIndex_ || 0) + (if !@parent then 0 else @parent.zIndex || 0)
        
    @accessors "scrollOffsetY",
        set: (v) -> 
            if v != @scrollOffsetY_
                @scrollOffsetY_ = v
                @needsFullUpdate = yes
        get: -> @scrollOffsetY_
        
    ###*
    * A stack-layout which layouts all it sub-objects
    * like a stack vertically or horizontally.
    * 
    * @module ui
    * @class Object_StackLayout
    * @extends ui.Object_UIElement
    * @memberof ui
    * @constructor
    ###  
    constructor: (x, y, width, height, orientation) ->
        super()
        
        @dstRect.set(x || 0, y || 0, width || 1, height || 1 )
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the layout is resizable.
        * @property resizable
        * @type boolean
        ###
        @resizable = no
        
        ###*
        * The UI object's animator-component to execute different kind of animations like move, rotate, etc. on it.
        * @property animator
        * @type gs.Component_Animator
        ###
        @animator = new gs.Component_Animator()
        
        ###*
        * The layout's sub-objects.
        * @property controls
        * @type ui.Object_UIElement[]
        ###
        @controls = []
        
        ###*
        * The stack-layout's orientation. 
        * @property orientation
        * @type gs.Orientation
        ###
        @orientation = if orientation == "vertical" then 1 else 0
        
        ###*
        * The stack-layout's scroll-offset on y-axis. 
        * @property scrollOffsetY
        * @type number
        ###
        @scrollOffsetY = 0
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the layouts resizes to fit its content.
        * @property sizeToFit
        * @type boolean
        ###
        @sizeToFit = no
        
        ###*
        * The behavior component to add stack-layout specific behavior.
        * @property behavior
        * @type gs.Component_StackLayoutBehavior
        ###
        @behavior = new gs.Component_StackLayoutBehavior()
        @behavior.orientation = @orientation
        @addComponent(@behavior)
        @addComponent(@animator)
        
ui.Object_StackLayout = Object_StackLayout
